curam.util.ctm.bom
Interface AuthorisationBOM

All Superinterfaces:
BusinessObjectModule
public interface AuthorisationBOM
extends BusinessObjectModule

The module checks if logged in user has access to do read/write operation on business object module.

Method Summary
 boolean isUserAuthorizedToRead(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
          Validates if logged in user has read access to the business object.
 boolean isUserAuthorizedToWrite(BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier)
          Validates if logged in user has write access to the business object.
